column1: The kit includes two primer sets amplifying the hypervariable regions V2, V3, V4, V6 - 7, V8 and V9 regions of the 16S rRNA gene.
PCR amplification of the V1 - V3 region of the 16S rRNA gene The hypervariable regions V1, V2 and V3 of the 16S rRNA gene were amplified following a previously described methodology [ 6].
